fields.name: Atlanta Volunteer Lawyers Foundation
fields.contactName: Cole Thaler, Mary Koenig, Camille Millar
fields.description: Promotes access to justice by inspiring volunteer attorneys to provide high-quality education, advocacy, and representation at no charge to low-income families with basic civil legal needs at critical times in their lives. Through its Saturday Lawyer Program, free legal representation is available to eligible tenants in a variety of landlord/tenant disputes. Through this program, the AVLF also provides free legal representation to eligible workers with a claim for unpaid wages against an employer. The Safe Families Office, a collaboration among the AVLF, Partnership Against Domestic Violence, and the Fulton County Superior Court, provides legal assistance and safety planning on a walk-in basis to victims of intimate partner violence and stalking who are seeking to file a Temporary Protective Order in Fulton County.
